About the Company: Mathew Easow Research Securities Ltd. This company has been engaged in Equity Research, Software Development, Securities Trading and Advisory Services. MEFS was also a Category IV Merchant Banker since 1993. MEFS has acted as Advisors in the public issue of Tatanagar Bricks, Kusum Iron & Steel and Jamshedpur Metal Treat. In view of the expanding business, Mathew Easow Research and Securities (MERS) was formed. It has acted as adviser to the public issue of Tatanagar Bricks, Kusum Iron & Steel, Jamshedpur Metal Treat, and other companies. Investments have been made in the capitals markets, and income is generated from the sale of shares and securities, dividend and interest The company provides technical and fundamental analysis to companies, stock brokers, high-net-worth individuals and retail clients, portfolio management and mutual fund applications.
